name: Sensei, Anata ni Chikadukitai
nutshell: Takamine finally got his dream job as a high school teacher with his crush, Natsume. Now the two of them will be together, not as teacher and student, but as teacher and teacher. Does Takamine have an ulterior motive…?

name: Mitsumete Honey
nutshell: A short, cute oneshot about two seatmates bonding about glasses.

name: Kaiyorihito Kaiyorishiki
nutshell:
Aritsune is the head of the clan which wields the power of “Kaiyori”. As long as one can obtain the “Aya” which the clan head holds, no matter who, he will gain magnificent powers…
He lives a normal school life with his trusted aide, Chika and his beloved sister, Akira. But, without noticing, and also due to the powers he wields, everything started changing…
Note: This series was axed after 2 volumes due to copyright infringement by the author.

name: City of Blood
nutshell: Is the unachievable the best thing? Shouldn't the present happiness be treasured the most? A broken vase cannot be fixed, chasing after a past that does not exist will only bring a deeper pain to oneself and others. A vampire's love and hatred will be displayed here, in their fullest…

name: Logres of Swords and Sorcery: Goddess of Disaster
nutshell:
In a time when the 6 Goddesses of the world vanished without a trace, a hunter by the name of Wein miraculously stumbles upon a girl who calls herself Elise, claiming to be the 7th Goddess. After finding himself in a losing battle against a monster and suffering severe wounds, Wein was on the brink of death. With the help of Elise's powers, he was able to cling onto dear life. But as an aftermath of exerting her power, Elise's body turned into a little girl…
In order to restore Elise's lost power, Wein and his friends set off on an adventure!!

name: Mahiru no Hyakki Yakou
nutshell: Annoying neighbor, Zoku Zoku !! Satori who reads the heart of a person. Make an ominous prophecy. Kappa is chasing after imitation. The modern times when the mountains turned into isolat and the darkness of the night was removed. Yokai appear in the streets in the middle of the day! How can we co-exist with those who are not angry but annoying? The modern monster miracle drawn by the novelist Hikaru Higa with plenty of emotion!

name: Shinigami to Chocolate Parfait
nutshell:
Jinna Amakura was a typical, if not a bit stingy, high school boy. Typical, that is, until he died. Or… at least he was supposed to die, but he didn't. Jinna is now considered by the powers that be as a "Soul Irregular".
Enter Nagi. Nagi is a Grim Reaper on her first job - to kill Jinna and return his soul to the proper cycle of life and death. If she fails, she will be turned into her favorite dessert and eaten by the head of the Angels of Death. Not only does her job start off as worse as it possibly could, but Nagi and Jinna form an almost friendly, if not unusual relationship… just wait till her boss finds out…

name: Joshikou no Ouji-sama to Osananajimi no Jimiko-chan
nutshell:
A story about an orthodox Prince(girl) of a girl's only high school and her childhood friend(plain looking). Don't you agree that plain looking girls who are actually strong willed are really moe???
By the way, the plain girl's full name isn't featured, but it's Tanaka Mitsuru-chan.
PS: This work is a part of YuriComi 2021: https://www.pixiv.net/en/tags/%E3%83%A6%E3%83%AA%E3%82%B3%E3%83%9F2021/artworks

name: Kantai Collection -KanColle- The Shape of Feelings (Doujinshi)
nutshell: Doujin from Hiro (https://www.pixiv.net/member.php?id=2564329)

name: Michizure Policy
nutshell:
Michizure Policy
Shinohara, who liked to take care of others like a mother, and Nishioka, who loved sweet things just like a kid (with big build), were good friends. Shinohara loved Nishioka, but was totally a coward when it comes to love. He always thought that “this love is impossible” and continued to be Nishioka’s good friend when he blurted out his feelings unintentionally. To Shinohara’s surprise, Nishioka accepted him and they started to go out. But Shinohara was having doubts and wouldn’t want to believe in Nishioka. What should Nishioka do?
Uten Kekkou Rule
College finals have kept Takao and Wakamiya apart, but now, even with the bad weather, Wakamiya rushes over to Takao's apartment for… some hot love. Takao, however, does not seem to be in the mood since he is the one that does everything. Tonight, Takao wants to be the one that is made to be "in the mood". But will Wakamiya still be in the mood after being thrown into the shower with a "7 minute erection"?

name: The Dolls' Apartment
nutshell:
Yayoi gets dumped, but then meets someone who understands her in a way her ex never did.
-From Lillicious

name: Kuchibiru ni Amai Doku - Bridal Night (Doujinshi)
nutshell: Pairing: Yuu x Jin

name: Daikyuu Tokkusoumuka no Ajin to Geboku
God of Knowledge
nutshell: One day, Lei Yiming, the school scum, suddenly gains the superpower of “seeing the answers to questions” and achieves a score of more than 700 in the midterm exam, he then gains the qualifications to enter the prestigious “Elite Academy” in the province. Who would have thought that he would become a breadwinner?! After enter the elite academy he encounter various strange things. He finally realized that all the students in this college actually have superpowers! And his encounter with the eccentric girl Xiao Ling Xian makes him gradually uncover the truth hidden behind this academy…

name: Regnal Trigger
nutshell: In the Trebian Empire’s mines, Aren and Toa led a life of harsh labor for 10 years. It was Aren’s dream to escape the mines together with his younger twin sister, Toa. However, it did not come into fruition. Toa ended her life through suicide. Losing the motivation to live without his sister, Aren commits to ending his own life. However, a mysterious figure nicknamed ‘Deed’ appears before him. Deed claims there is a method to revive Toa if Aren makes a contract with Deed…?

name: About a Man Who Can See Feelings and an Unapproachable Woman
Aoi Horus no Hitomi: Dansou no Joou no Monogatari
nutshell:
It's the beginning of a new era in the Egypt of pharaohs, the marriage of the young Hatshepsut to her half-brother Seti ensures his rise to Pharaoh, under the name of Thutmose II. Ambassadors of the gods on Earth, they shine to their people and seem at first glance like the perfect couple. However, under her mask of a perfect wife, Hatshepsut hides a deep rage… She doesn't want to accept the restrictions others try to place on her as a woman, she wants to become the Pharaoh, like her father!
Loosely based on the actual historical figure.

name: Rosen Blood
nutshell: After the carriage she had embarked upon crashed, Stella is saved by a tall dark and handsome stranger and brought to the mysterious mansion surrounded by poisonous roses in which he lives with three other gorgeous men. However, with no money left, Stella is forced to work as a maid which will prove dangerous for her because she is yet to find out that all four men are actually vampires!

name: Haikyuu!! - Kageyama-kun’s Birthday Book (Doujinshi)
nutshell: Happy Birthday, Kageyama-kun! What does Hinata have in store for his favorite setter?

name: Hatarake, Kentauros!
nutshell: After the passing of the Equal Opportunity Employment Act, everyone has equal rights in the workplace. Unfortunately, there are still many logistical difficulties yet to be overcome. For one, how's a centaur supposed to sit at a desk made for humans, anyway?

name: Touhou - Mamizou-san to Suzunaan to Yukai na Nakama-tachi (Doujinshi)
Shining
nutshell:
A tale about a cash strapped college girl, a band, a cafe and disillusionment.
It seems that the author discontinued her series Marichen Chronicle in order to start this new one.
Note: The releases by this Sura's Place do not follow the chapters of the manga. Instead, these are "updates" of approximatively 15 pages each.

name: Harajuku Takenoko Kouban
nutshell: Nishimoto Haruki is a 21 year old male and a newly recruited police officer. However, all his past assignments involved him dressing up as a girl in order to solve the crime. It seems that he has the feminine features that make him the only one suitable for the position. However, things get even crazier when he is assigned to be in the all female police squad surrounded by gorgeous women. He has to protect his secret that he's actually a man but Haruki is already having a hard time controlling his urges.

name: EVOL
nutshell:
Work, sleep, work, sleep... what a dull existence
Why even live?!
No hopes, no dreams
Everything’s predictable...
Suicide is salvation
But when you wake up in purgatory...
...and it's the same world you left?
One option left
Let's turn this fuckin' world upside down
The story of "Evol" begins in a village occupied by an armed group when a young girl, driven by despair, attempts suicide. She survives and wakes up, but when a man tries to drive her into a corner, a strange phenomenon occurs. The place changes, and something also happens to the boy who wakes up in the hospital after committing suicide.

name: Princess Nightmare
nutshell:
For her birthday present, she wishes she could be an ordinary girl. She commutes to Rose Academy in Usuyami Town. She is Little, a beautiful 114-year-old vampire. Her brother Radou watches her, there's a werewolf servant Inukai, and the magical boy Shinji. The ghost that threatens Little's school life has appeared.
Adapted from the otome game of the same name by Karin Entertainment.
Wikipedia

name: Senko no Shiindon
nutshell: http://www.moae.jp/comic/chibasho_senkonoshiindon

name: Hyperdimension Neptunia - Nep Biyori Victory (Doujinshi)
nutshell: Sequel to Nep Biyori mk2

name: Inuzaru Lovely Panchi
nutshell: 武道派ガール茅多と、ハイスペイケメン永臣は巷でも有名な犬猿幼なじみ。永臣からの“嫌がらせのキス”がきっかけで茅多は永臣が大嫌い！どーでもいい永臣はおいといて彼氏が欲しいけど、いいところにいつも永臣が現れて！？
